Posts.Content: Hi I used to cover up the entry site with a clear waterproof dressing that the District nurse gave me a supply of, this meant i could shower and the site wouldn't get wet.  i think you can get them from the chemist, its was a couple of years ago that i had mine and i cannot remember the name of them, but it is like a big clear plastic plaster.   gingermaz xx
Posts.Title: Showering with a Hickman Line?
